video.title: Satisfaction
video.synopsis: Three twentysomething friends -- couple Jason and Maggie and their single roommate, Mark -- search for satisfaction while pursuing their dreams.

episodes.synopsis: While a blackout leaves Jason and Maggie unable to settle a dispute without the Internet, Mark races to save six months' worth of thawing frozen food.
episodes.title: The Blackout Cometh

episodes.synopsis: Maggie persuades Mark to use his connections to land her an internship at a slick marketing agency.
episodes.title: The Internship, Relationship, Friendship

episodes.synopsis: After bumping into a college friend, Jason decides to take one last crack at his music. Elsewhere, Mark thinks that Simon may be the perfect wingman.
episodes.title: The Wind Beneath My Wingman

episodes.synopsis: To keep up appearances as the hip young couple, Jason and Maggie agree to score some pot for their suburbanite friends.
episodes.title: The Pot and the Pirate

episodes.synopsis: When a new girl moves into the building, Mark and Simon vie for her attention. Meanwhile, Jason and Maggie make friends with another couple.
episodes.title: First Contact

episodes.synopsis: Jason runs interference when Mark seeks revenge on someone who humiliated him in college.
episodes.title: Penis Face Cat Funeral

episodes.synopsis: When the subject of kids comes up, Jason and Maggie don't see eye to eye. Meanwhile, Mark tries to teach Simon a thing or two about going to a club.
episodes.title: Janet

episodes.synopsis: During a quest for brunch, hunger creates cracks in friendships as Jason worries that Mark has replaced him with Simon.
episodes.title: Sunday Brunchy Sunday

episodes.synopsis: When Mark unintentionally wears a suit, he's mistaken for a functioning member of society. Meanwhile, Jason and Maggie open a joint bank account.
episodes.title: Mo Money, Mo Problems

episodes.synopsis: Mark helps Jason deal with his confrontation issues. Meanwhile, Maggie questions her best male friend's intentions when he stays overnight.
episodes.title: Confrontations

episodes.synopsis: Maggie deals with an emasculated Jason after he discovers that he's incapable of doing handy work.
episodes.title: Fade to Blackened

episodes.synopsis: When Maggie's dad comes to town, Jason and Mark learn that he's been keeping a secret. Meanwhile, a new waitress at the bar becomes Maggie's nemesis.
episodes.title: Daddy Issues

episodes.synopsis: With a longtime friend about to get married, the gang goes into full wedding mode. Meanwhile, Mark's past with the bride puts a hitch in his plans.
episodes.title: Save the Date
